valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 26 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 27 Jan 2026

South Utsire.text:
Wind
In north, easterly or southeasterly 3 to 5, oc6 6 later. In south, easterly or southeasterly, 4 to 6, occasionally 7 later.

In north, wintry showers. In south, snow.
Visibility
In north, good, occasionally poor. In south, good, occasionally poor. Light icing later.
